item.description:
I will be at the theater at 6.  The movie is showing upstairs and so I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator.  I am coming from another event, so if you get there before me, please snag a table.   We will go in for seats at 6:30 and the movie time is 7.

My picture is on the web site, check it out so you will know what I look like. I will also be wearing a meetup pin and have a meetup sign.

If you miss the group before the movie, come find us after. We gather outside the room where the movie was just shown to discuss the film, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who are interested in going out for munchies and drinks.

Movie Details:

Release Date: February 11, 2011
Studio: Touchstone Pictures
Director: Kelly Asbury
Screenwriter: Rob Sprackling, John R. Smith, Kevin Cecil, Andy Riley, Mark Burton
Starring: James McAvoy, Emily Blunt, Michael Caine, Maggie Smith, Jason Statham, Patrick Stewart, Ashley Jensen, Stephen Merchant, Matt Lucas, Jim Cummings, Julie Walters, Richard Wilson, Ozzy Osbourne, Dolly Parton, Hulk Hogan
Genre: Adventure, Animation, Comedy
MPAA Rating: G
Official Website:
http://www.gnomeoandj...

Plot Summary: The greatest love story ever told, starring... garden gnomes? In the upcoming "Gnomeo & Juliet," Shakespeare's revered tale gets a comical, off-thewall makeover. Directed by Kelly Asbury ("Shrek 2") and showcasing both classic and original songs by Elton John, the film features the voices of James McAvoy and Emily Blunt as Gnomeo and Juliet, who have as many obstacles to overcome as their quasi namesakes when they are caught up in a feud between neighbors. But with plastic pink flamingos and thrilling lawnmower races in the mix, can this young couple find lasting happiness?
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin and have a meetup sign. If movie is upstairs I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalators, if downstairs I will be by the ropes near the concession stand till they let us line up inside.
item.name: Gnomeo & Juliet
